publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6286 Stewart Stevenson: The Carbon Accounting Scheme (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that the Carbon Accounting Scheme (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*
